title: Sirloin steak with chunky chips
description: You know your boat's come in when you've got a thick, juicy and perfectly grilled steak like this to look forward to.
ingredients: 3 large potatoes (Maris Piper, Golden Wonder or King Edward are ideal)
vegetable oil, for deep frying, plus extra for brushing the steaks
2 x 275g/10oz sirloin steaks, removed from the fridge 15 minutes before cooking
salt and freshly ground black pepper
